description:
Are you a driven and ambitious individual with a passion for business development? Do you have a proven track record of success in identifying and pursuing new business opportunities? If so, Caterpillar has an exciting opportunity for you as our Senior Manager of Business Development.As a global leader in the manufacturing industry, Caterpillar is seeking a dynamic and experienced Senior Manager to join our team and drive the growth of our business. In this role, you will have the opportunity to utilize your strategic thinking and relationship-building skills to identify and cultivate new business opportunities, while also managing and expanding existing partnerships.We are seeking a highly motivated and results-driven individual who possesses excellent communication and leadership skills. The ideal candidate will have a minimum of 10 years of experience in business development, preferably in the manufacturing or heavy equipment industry. A Bachelor's degree in Business Administration or a related field is required, and an MBA is strongly preferred.If you are ready to take on a challenging and rewarding role with a global leader, we encourage you to apply for our Senior Manager of Business Development position at Caterpillar. Join our team and make a significant impact on the growth and success of our company.

Develop and implement strategies to identify and pursue new business opportunities for the company.
Research and analyze market trends and competitor activity to identify potential areas for growth.
Build and maintain relationships with potential clients and partners to expand the company's business portfolio.
Conduct thorough market research and feasibility studies to assess the potential success of new business ventures.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to develop and execute business plans that align with the company's goals and objectives.
Monitor and track sales performance metrics to measure the success of business development efforts.
Provide regular updates and reports to senior management on business development activities, opportunities, and results.
Negotiate and finalize contracts and agreements with potential clients and partners.
Manage and maintain relationships with existing clients and partners to ensure their satisfaction and continued partnership with the company.
Stay updated on industry trends, regulations, and best practices to continuously improve and enhance the company's business development strategies.
Mentor and train junior members of the business development team.
Represent the company at industry events, conferences, and networking opportunities to promote the company's brand and services.

Caterpillar is an Equal Opportunity Employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees. We do not discriminate based upon race, religion, color, national origin, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, age, status as a protected veteran, status as an individual with a disability, or other applicable legally protected characteristics.
